name: Eastern Caribbean-Southeast Asia Economic and Cultural Chamber
goal: The primary goal of the Chamber is to engage and facilitate tourism, trade, investment and external relations between six (6) independent Eastern Caribbean countries and the growing Southeast Asian community not only in the ASEAN region but also around the world. Realizing that there is a distinct lack of a relationship between the emerging island nations in the Eastern Caribbean and the actively developed Southeast Asian countries, the Chamber hopes to be instrumental to bridge this important gap. More importantly, understanding the great and successful partnerships that the EU has with both these regions, it is but natural for the Chamber to take part and observe in the ongoing relationships and activities between the EU and these two economic regions.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives: As of this writing, our organization will concentrate on the observation in EU initiatives with regards to these two sub-regions.
